content.text:
# Tamil Nadu State Film Award for Best Child Artist

The Tamil Nadu State Film Award for Best Child Star is given by the state government as part of its annual Tamil Nadu State Film Awards for Tamil  (Kollywood) films.
The list
Here is a list of the award winners and the films for which they won.
